page.title: 20Decision Makers of Westhill
page.content:
The main decision makers of Westhill are the College Council,the P.T.A., Senior Community Education, Rector of the Academy,Westhill Residents Association,Gordon District Council and Grampian Regional Council. Most decisions which are made are planning or housing decisions,improving housing ,pupil and staff welfare and helping the PTA and College Council. The people who serve the area are a mixture of new (one only ten days service) and experienced (ten years service). All of these people's organisations have others to help them with decisions; most are democratic ,being made by a majority of people. All our decision makers communicate regularly.
Work completed by First Year Students within the Social Studies Department.
